item.title: Overcoming Bilateral IT Band Syndrome after 5 Years
item.description: After 5 years of chronic knee pain, I finally found what worked to overcome bilateral IT band syndrome. Here's my complete recovery journey.

item.title: Failures of the English Language
item.description: How the ambiguous word 'vaccine' contributed to widespread confusion during the COVID-19 pandemic, and why English needs more precise medical terminology.

item.title: Why do we use shampoo?
item.description: The surprising 100-year history of modern shampoo and how 1970s advertising campaigns changed how we think about hair hygiene forever.
